aLookBack.header_X_years_ago: {years_old, plural, one {{years_old} year ago} other {{years_old} years ago}}

drop.ready_to_upload: {count, plural, one {{count} file can be uploaded} other {{count} files can be uploaded}}
drop.title: Drop files here

log.load_images: {amount, plural, one {{amount} load image} other {{amount} load images}}

toast.error_reordering_files: Error changing the order of files

alert.login_failed:
Login failed!
Please check your input data.
alert.migration_failed: The migration failed! Check the server logs (e.g., with docker logs dailytxt) to see if you can find more detailed information there!
alert.registration_failed: Registration failed - please analyze the error messages!
alert.registration_success:
Registration successful - please log in!
Afterwards, it's best to check out the Settings!

login.create_account_info: Usernames are case-insensitive during login. It's recommended to write a name normally (e.g., "Tom") so it looks correct in exports. You can still log in with "tom".

migration.account_info:
During the migration, backup codes (if available) were invalidated and need to be recreated!
Additionally, familiarize yourself with the new settings for your account!

Once all accounts have been migrated without errors, the "old" data can be manually deleted in the admin panel.
migration.start_message: Data migration has started. This may take a few moments.
migration.success_message:
Migration completed without any detected errors! Please restart the login.
Then check if all data has been migrated correctly.
migration.warning: In the meantime, do not reload the page and do not log in again!

login.migration_completed_with_errors:
{error_count, plural, one {Migration completed with {error_count} detected error! Please check the server logs for details!
If the login doesn't work, or the data is incorrect, the migrated data must be manually removed.} other {Migration completed with {error_count} detected errors! Please check the server logs for details!
If the login doesn't work, or the data is incorrect, the migrated data must be manually removed.}}

toast.login_expired: Login has expired. Please log in again.
toast.login_invalid: Authentication failed. Please log in again.

history.description: By clicking Save, you make the shown older text the current main text.
history.title: History

read.load_images: {count, plural, one {Load {count} image of the month ({size})} other {Load all {count} images of the month ({size})}}

reauth.description: For security reasons, you must enter your password again.
reauth.title: Confirm Password

search.description:
With Ctrl + F the search field is focused.
You can search for text, file names, and tags:
  • Text: When using multiple search terms, the following rules apply:
    • EXACT: Put the complete search term in double quotation marks to search for the exact sequence of words.
    • OR: Separate search terms with | to find entries where at least one term is used.
    • AND: Separate search terms with spaces to find entries where all terms are used. The order of the terms is irrelevant, as is the distance between them.
  • File names: If the search term consists of one word, then it will search not only for text, but also for file names.
  • Tags: The search term must start with #. It will search for every item tagged with the tag.

settings.about.donate:
Do you enjoy DailyTxT? Then I would be very happy with a little donation! ❤️
Development and maintenance of the tool take a lot of time. Thank you! 🥰
settings.about.version_info: Note: This automatic version detection may not always be correct.

admin.delete_old_data_warning: I strongly recommend creating a backup of the old data manually!
admin.delete_warning: The user account will be completely and permanently deleted!
admin.environment_variables_description: These are the environment variables that were defined when DailyTxT started. They are probably found in the docker-compose file.
admin.login_description: The admin password is defined server-side as an environment variable!
admin.login_error: Unknown error when checking the password.
admin.old_data_description:
The data of the old DailyTxT version 1.x.x is currently located in the old directory.
The folder occupies storage space in addition to the currently available/migrated data. If you are sure that all users listed below have migrated their data without errors (and appear in the list above), then you can delete this old data as well!
admin.registration_description: The creation of new accounts is currently disabled by default (via environment variable). With this menu, registration can be enabled for 5 minutes. Afterwards, it will automatically be disabled again. The environment variable remains unchanged.
admin.registration_open_error: Error when temporarily opening the registration.
admin.registration_status_error: Error checking if registration is allowed.
admin.title: Admin
admin.toast_success_old_data_delete: Old data (before migration) has been deleted
admin.warning_delete_self: Your own user account should not be deleted here, but preferably within the "Settings".

settings.aLookBack.description:
• Decide from which past years diary entries of the same calendar day should be displayed.
  • Only applies to write mode.
  • Example: 1,5,10 shows entries from 1 year ago, 5 years ago, and 10 years ago below the text field (if available).

ALookBack.help_text: Enter all past years to be displayed here. Example: 1,5,10. Use commas to separate, avoid spaces.
ALookBack.invalid_input: Please enter only numbers separated by commas.
ALookBack.useIt: Show entries of the same day from the past

settings.background_gradient: Gradient (is newly generated on each page load)
settings.backup_codes.description:
• Backup codes work like one-time passwords. They can always be used instead of the password, but they are only valid once and are then deleted.
  • 6 codes are always generated, which replace the previous codes (if available).
  • You must write down the codes immediately after creation; they cannot be shown again!
settings.backup_codes.error: Error creating backup codes! Maybe the password is incorrect?
settings.backup_codes.success:
Your backup codes:

Write down the codes; they cannot be displayed again after closing this window!
settings.change_username.description:
Note about the username:
Case is not considered when using it for login. However, a correctly written name (e.g., "Tom" instead of "tom") looks nicer in the export or similar situations.
settings.delete_account.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This cannot be undone!
settings.delete_account.description: This deletes your account and all associated data. This cannot be undone!
settings.delete_account.success:
Your account has been deleted successfully!
You should be logged out automatically. If not, please log out manually.
settings.export.description: Export your entries as a formatted HTML file. Images can optionally be embedded into the HTML. All files are also provided in a ZIP file.
settings.export.help_text:
Notes:
  • The HTML will not include the history of individual days.
  • Re-import is not possible. This function is not a backup but purely for export to obtain an easily readable HTML file.
settings.export.period_invalid: The start date must be before the end date!
settings.export.show_images_description: Show images directly below the text (they are also always provided as links)
settings.first_day_of_week.help_text: Select the day on which the week should start (affects the display in the calendar). Changes may only be visible after reloading the page.
settings.images_description:
• When loading a text, uploaded images (if available) can be loaded automatically. Increased data usage!
  • Alternatively, a button is displayed to load all images.
settings.images_loading_default: Automatically load images by default (on every device)
settings.images_loading_per_device: Decide for each device whether images should be loaded automatically
settings.installation_help:
You can also install DailyTxT like an app. This is done through the browser settings, but it is not supported by every browser. Currently, no installation has been detected.
  • Android: "Add to Home screen"
  • Apple: "Share" -> "Add to Home Screen"
settings.language_auto_detect: Determine language based on the browser. Currently:
settings.language.help_translate: Your language is not included? Then help to translate! You can find information about this here:
settings.language_not_available: The language {browserLanguage} is not available. The default language {defaultLanguage} is used.
settings.language.reload_info: Some changes only become visible after reloading the page.

password.passwords_dont_match: The new passwords do not match!
password.success_backup_codes_warning: Attention: Backup codes were invalidated (if available) and must be recreated.

reauth.description: To enhance security, the password may be requested again on each page load.
reauth.label: Request password on each page load
reauth.title: Password on page load

statistics.bookpages: {pages, plural, one {You've already written {pages} book page (at 300 words per page)} other {You've already written {pages} book pages (at 300 words per page)}}
statistics.daysWithActivity: {days, plural, one {{days} day with activity} other {{days} days with activity}}

settings.tags.delete_confirmation:
Delete tag permanently?
This may take a moment because each entry must be searched for potential links. Changes may only become visible after a page reload.
settings.tags.description: Here you can edit tags or delete them completely from DailyTxT.
settings.tags.no_tags: No tags are available yet. Create a new tag in write mode.
settings.timezone.auto_detect:
Automatically determine timezone based on the browser.
Currently:
settings.timezone.description: Set the timezone to be used for the timestamp ("{written_on}").
settings.timezone.help_text:
When traveling, it can be useful to determine the timezone based on the browser. Then the date and time at the destination will likely be recognized better.
If, on the other hand, you use different timezones at home in a private browser (e.g., always UTC), it can be useful to set a specific timezone here.
settings.timezone.manual: Always use the following timezone for this user account:
settings.title: Settings

toast.invalid_template_empty: Name or content of a template must not be empty!

updates.include_test_versions: Also notify me about new test versions that contain "testing" in the version name. These may be faulty — be sure to make a backup first!

tags.description:
Here you can add and remove tags for the selected date to categorize your entries. You can also create new tags here.

With Ctrl + G the search field is focused (desktop only).

To change a tag or delete it entirely, you must switch to the settings.

toast.error_adding: Error adding the tag to the selected date!

password.available_backup_codes: {count, plural, one {Still {count} backup code available!} other {Still {count} backup codes available!}}

pwa.install_description: Install DailyTxT for a better app-like experience.
